title: Stack Overflow For Teams Goes Freemium - AVC
body:
I could not help but use the word Freemium in the headline to this post. For those that don’t know, the word Freemium was invented here at AVC, [back in 2006](https://avc.com/2006/03/the_freemium_bu/). I am quite proud of that fact, even though I did not come up with the word myself.

With that business taken care of, let’s move on to the topic of the day.

Our portfolio company Stack Overflow, best know for [its massive free knowledge sharing service for programmers](https://stackoverflow.com/), has been building a companion business over the last few years called [Stack Overflow For Teams](https://stackoverflow.com/teams). Teams is the same knowledge-sharing software that programmers know and love but for private sharing inside of companies.

Since launching Teams, it has been free for the first thirty days. But it takes longer than that to build great knowledge sharing inside of companies. So last week, Stack launched a new version of Stack Overflow For Teams that is now free forever for teams of 50 or less.

If you use Stack Overflow and love how it surfaces the answers to your questions and you want to use it for your team, you can do that for free right now. Go [here](https://stackoverflow.com/teams) and click Create A Free Team.

A Freemium Stack for your team. I love it.

title: The Auction: Owning the Paradoxes of Coinbase
body:
![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/d36ab15a-4995-4e4e-83ad-3d99922cc7db.jpeg?height=2100&width=2700)

Welcome to the Coinbase NFT auction page. Below, you'll see the three NFTs created as part of our work. This represents a collaboration between [The Generalist](https://www.readthegeneralist.com/) and [Visualize Value](visualizevalue.com). All illustrations were created by [Jack Butcher](https://twitter.com/jackbutcher). 

The written work encapsulated in "[The Paradoxes of Coinbase](https://generalist.mirror.xyz/Zgfy7QpX2YR8wAKSlkyEP2MK4qL86fcbbKiqgcuCuMY)" represents the efforts of [Jill Carlson](https://twitter.com/jillruthcarlson), [Ryan Todd](https://twitter.com/\_RJTodd), [Katherine Wu](https://twitter.com/katherineykwu), [Lex Sokolin](https://twitter.com/LexSokolin), [Michael Sidgmore](https://twitter.com/michaelsidgmore), [Ellie Frost](https://twitter.com/BlockBytch_), [Max Heald](https://twitter.com/max_heald), [Marc Rubinstein](https://twitter.com/MarcRuby), [David Wei](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dlw17/), [Adam Draper](https://twitter.com/AdamDraper), [Ian Kar](https://twitter.com/iankar_), and [Mario Gabriele](https://twitter.com/mariodgabriele)

Please enjoy the pieces. 

**The Paradoxes of Coinbase - The First Ever Tokenized, Crowdfunded Equity Research Report**

This piece represents The Generalist's coverage of Coinbase in the briefing "The Paradoxes of Coinbase." Jack's visualization illustrates how $COIN is an example of the Jordain Paradox. 

[Token #2394](auction://0xabEFBc9fD2F806065b4f3C237d4b59D9A97Bcac7?network=mainnet&tokenId=2394)

**TIMELINE**

This piece tells the story of Coinbase's rise in tandem with bitcoin. In a matter of minutes, the viewer understands how the company ascended from wonkish misfit to a global behemoth.
 
[Token #2396](auction://0xabEFBc9fD2F806065b4f3C237d4b59D9A97Bcac7?network=mainnet&tokenId=2396)

**SATOSHI**

Crypto has always been a place for believers. The creator of bitcoin, Satoshi Nakamoto summarizes that in the quote below. Coinbase has embodied this ethos.

[Token #2395](auction://0xabEFBc9fD2F806065b4f3C237d4b59D9A97Bcac7?network=mainnet&tokenId=2395)

*The Generalist would like to thank [Mint Fund](mint.af) and the [$BOUNTY](https://mint.mirror.xyz/mDws2xGmJCq55ehGDdcv8tGDCpSd_c_CfeqhexiKSqU) backers for crowdfunding and coordinating the development of an opensource version of reserve auctions, implemented by Billy Rennekamp.*

title: [RFC] Compound
body:
In partnership with [Compound Grants](https://compoundgrants.org/72a37fa77b2b4423a97602d6a70fb5f5), Our Network is putting out a **Request for Coverage (RFC)** on [Compound](https://compound.finance/). 

Interested contestants should submit a public [Dune Analytics](https://duneanalytics.com/) dashboard with 6+ data points on Compound's network health using this [this submission form](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfVf22RXYHiUpDfa3eJx5f9w0oLXWeDAaMCdQqGnOmwU2fsaA/viewform?usp=sf_link). Winning submissions will also be featured in a future [Our Network](http://www.ournetwork.xyz) newsletter.

To get started, see below for some ideas:
* Comparing Compound's daily revenue to COMP issuance 
* Charting reserves for each market over time (e.g., chart showing reserve growth on USDC day by day) 
* Charting % of total borrow for each asset over time (e.g., USDC, 41%, DAI, 40%, USDT 8%, etc.) 
* Utilization rate per asset over time  
* List of largest suppliers and borrowers 
* List of accounts close to being liquidated  
* List of accounts that performed liquidations, listed by dollar amount (notional) 

**Due Date**: 
- March 28th

**Bounty**: 
- $5k worth of COMP each for the top 3 dashboards
- $250 worth of COMP to all other applicants 💰

**Judge**: 
- Larry Sukernik (Compound Grants)

title: Buy this NFT to Sponsor Seed Club’s Creator x Crypto Summit
body:
We’re excited to host the first Crypto x Creator summit from March 31 - April 2. The summit is an opportunity to bring two worlds together, the Creator Economy and Crypto. 

NFTs, Social tokens, DAOs, Creator driven business and the uncertainties that come with it all are the topics we’ll dive into with some of the leading thinkers from both sides of the web 2.0 / web 3.0 divide. You won't want to miss it ([so register here](http://summit.seedclub.io)). 

### Unlocking Content with Tokens 

We've had a number of requests to sponsor the event and thought we should do something special to that end. 

That’s why we’re excited to announce Summit Sponsorship NFT. We’ve put 3 NFTs up for auction on Zora (each NFT represents sponsorship for one day).

We’re big fans of the utility that social tokens and NFTs bring to communities. Token Gating access to a discord is one of the clearest ways to align incentives with a small community and give all members upside in the growth in value of that community. 


We’re auctioning off one NFT for each day of the Summit. The purchaser of the NFT is essentially “unlocking” the content for everyone that day. No tickets, no paywalls, no gates. The NFT holder will get all the thanks, accolades and admiration from our growing community and the thousands of watchers around the world. 

### What Sponsors Get

Winning the NFT auction will entitle each sponsor to the following for the corresponding summit days:

- Be the named sponsor (name + logo) of each day (on our website, the live stream and in discord.) 
- The opportunity host 1 session as a capstone session each day (up to 30 mins which you’d better make good because it’s at the end of the day, not right in the middle.)
- A bunch of attention and thanks from the various Seed Club social media channels (Twitter, Discord, Email)
- Recognition as an early Seed Club supporter (and all that entails … which is nothing just yet, but will hopefully be something in the future)


### About the NFTs

One of our earliest supporters, and one of the earliest issuers of a Social Token, and really an early adopter of NFTs (man, this guy is early) is [Connie Digital](https://twitter.com/ConnieDigital). Connie brings his unique DIGITAL vibes to every piece he creates and we asked him to bring those same vibes to the creation of 3 Sponsorship NFTs. 

You can view and bid on the collection here:



### Auction Details. 

- Auction will close on Friday March 26th at 6pm Pacific time. 
- Winners will be chosen by the Seed Club team (we reserve the right not to choose the highest bid)
- Winners will need to reach out to the Seed Club twitter and provide proof of ownership prior to unlocking full sponsorship benefits.

Questions or comments. Join our [Discord](http://discord.gg/WT2fHy4) or [Twitter](https://twitter.com/seedclubhq)
